channel.title: How to mutilog
channel.description:
It's really very simple. I've used this method to log in from up to four accounts on the same computer. You don't even need to download anything.
1.Open up 1 runescape window for each account you going to multilog onto. 2. Get to the login page and type in your information(username,password) but don't log in yet. 3. Do that for as many accounts that your going to log into. 4. Line the windows up so that the log in button is lined up down your computer screen. (See picture at the end to understand(will add later)) Make sure that the window thats furthest to the bottom is the furthest back. 5. Click login for all of the windows (really fast) starting from the screen thats in front of the others (A scar script which does this would work well).
[URL=http://www.free4up.com/ShowImage.aspx?fn=149209212212012.GIF][IMG]http://www.free4up.com/view.axd?fn=149209212212012.GIF[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://www.free4up.com/ShowImage.aspx?fn=049048051204244.GIF][IMG]http://www.free4up.com/view.axd?fn=049048051204244.GIF[/img][/URL]

item.title: How to mutilog
item.dc:creator: @redragonje65 redragonje65
item.description:
@redragonje65 wrote:

[quote=“doctorwho278, post:2, topic:69635”]Please Note: You cannot do this on the same world it says to many log in’s form this computer

P.s if you get banned for multilogging then thats your own fault for using this silly multilog by redragoje65

Thankyou
Doctorwho278[/quote]

I’ve done up to 4 on same world… If i had enough accounts I think I could get upto 6-8. Higher if i use a script to click.

you forgot the n

Read full topic

item.title: How to mutilog
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

doctorwho278:

Please Note: You cannot do this on the same world it says to many log in’s form this computer

… The whole point of this is to get on the same world, and if you do it quick enough, it will work. How is FAGex going to know we’re multi-logging anyways? It’s not like they pay attention to anything anyways, they just let bots handle the bans, thats why you never see anyone really get banned unless 100 people report them…

Read full topic

It’s really very simple. I’ve used this method to log in from up to four accounts on the same computer. You don’t even need to download anything.

1.Open up 1 runescape window for each account you going to multilog onto.
2. Get to the login page and type in your information(username,password) but don’t log in yet.
3. Do that for as many accounts that your going to log into.
